numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph represents five sports leagues.
2. In each of the five sports leagues, there are fewer coaches of color than players of color.
3. The number of coaches of color is disproportionately low compared to the number of players of color.
4. The National Football League is a sports league.
5. In the National Football League, 13% of head coaches are people of color.
6. In the National Football League, 74% of players are people of color.
7. In the National Football League, there are nearly six players of color per one coach of color.
8. The Women's National Basketball Association is a sports league.
9. The National Basketball Association is a sports league.
10. In the Women's National Basketball Association, there are approximately 3 players of color for every coach of color.
11. In the National Basketball Association, there are approximately 3 players of color for every coach of color.
12. I wonder what causes the disproportionate difference between coaches of color and players of color.
13. I wonder what each sports league is currently doing to combat these disparities.
14. This situation has an impact on my community.
15. This situation reflects that people of color have disproportionately few opportunities for leadership positions.
16. This situation reflects that people of color have disproportionately few opportunities for positions of power.
17. The headline is: Disproportionately Few Head Coaching Opportunities for People of Color in Major Sports Leagues.
